sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The vvound's o' the Kirk o' Scotland in her head, heart, hands, and feet; held forth in a sermon preach't at Edinburgh by Mr James Rew. [sic] Red-Shankes sermon. Row, James, 17th cent.
[2], 10 p.
Printed by William Du-Gard, London : anno Dom. 1650.
Originally published in 1642 as: The Red-Shankes sermon. Annotation on Thomason copy: "Octob: 14". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
